import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Resolve ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/close"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Resolves a ticket and marks it closed using workflow resolution settings.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Locate the ticket via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **CloseReasonTypeId** (optional) – Call [GET /api/v1.0/workflows/steps](/docs/api/workflows/get-workflow-steps) to review available close reasons and select a `CloseReasonTypeId` if the workflow requires one.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify ticket to resolve: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with filters for pending resolution → collect `Items[].TicketId`.
2. Review current state: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) and [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/status](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-status) to ensure all next steps are completed.
3. (Optional) Load close reasons via [GET /api/v1.0/workflows/steps](/docs/api/workflows/get-workflow-steps) and choose an appropriate `CloseReasonTypeId`.
4. Submit closure: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/close](/docs/api/tickets/close-ticket) with the optional close reason payload to mark the ticket resolved.
5. Refresh ticket context: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-steps) and [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/timeline](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-timeline) to verify closure activities are recorded.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ticketId (path). Optional body: CloseReasonTypeId.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the ticket to close. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`.","example":"0466a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c8","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"description":"Optional closure metadata such as close reason identifiers.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Payload submitted when closing a ticket. Supports optional close reason and workflow control flags.","properties":{"CloseReasonTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the selected close reason. Obtain by calling [GET /api/v1.0/sites/{siteUrl}](/docs/api/sites/get-site-by-url) and reading `Item.Settings.CloseReasonTypes`, or use [GET /api/v1.0/workflows/steps](/docs/api/workflows/get-workflow-steps) when inspecting workflow-specific close reasons.","nullable":true,"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getSiteByUrl","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/sites/{siteUrl}","responseField":"Item.Settings.CloseReasonTypes[].CloseReasonTypeId"}},"SkipCheckingNonMandatorySteps":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, bypasses validation of non-mandatory workflow steps allowing immediate closure even if optional steps are incomplete.","default":false},"ForceCloseRelatedTickets":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, automatically closes any related subtickets or linked tickets when closing the parent ticket.","default":false},"RunPostOperationsAsync":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, runs post-closure operations (notifications, rule execution, etc.) asynchronously in the background for faster response time.","default":true}},"example":{"CloseReasonTypeId":"c98ae44e-ada0-4ae7-ae30-817785c00002","SkipCheckingNonMandatorySteps":false,"ForceCloseRelatedTickets":false},"title":"TicketCloseRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
